verses.kjv: Furthermore then we beseech you, brethren, and exhort you by the Lord Jesus, that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God, so ye would abound more and more.
verses.ct: Finally, brothers and sisters, we ask and encourage you in the Lord Jesus: you learned from us how to live in a way that pleases God, and you are already doing this, but keep growing in it more and more.

verses.kjv: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus.
verses.ct: You already know the instructions we passed on to you through the authority of the Lord Jesus.

verses.kjv: For this is the will of God, even your sanctification, that ye should abstain from fornication:
verses.ct: What God wants is for you to be set apart for him — that you stay away from sexual immorality.

verses.kjv: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour;
verses.ct: Each of you should learn to control your own body in a way that is holy and honorable,

verses.kjv: Not in the lust of concupiscence, even as the Gentiles which know not God:
verses.ct: not driven by uncontrolled sexual desire like people who don't know God.

verses.kjv: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter: because that the Lord is the avenger of all such, as we also have forewarned you and testified.
verses.ct: No one should cross the line and take advantage of a fellow believer in this matter, because the Lord will punish everyone who does these things. We warned you about this before and made it very clear.

verses.kjv: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness, but unto holiness.
verses.ct: God didn't call us to live impure lives but to live in holiness.

verses.kjv: He therefore that despiseth, despiseth not man, but God, who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit.
verses.ct: So anyone who rejects this teaching isn't rejecting a human authority — they're rejecting God, who gives you his Holy Spirit.

verses.kjv: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you: for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another.
verses.ct: When it comes to loving each other as brothers and sisters, I don't really need to write to you about that, because God himself has taught you to love one another.

verses.kjv: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia: but we beseech you, brethren, that ye increase more and more;
verses.ct: And in fact, you already show that love to all the believers throughout Macedonia. But we urge you, brothers and sisters, to keep doing it even more.

verses.kjv: And that ye study to be quiet, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands, as we commanded you;
verses.ct: Make it your goal to live a quiet life, mind your own affairs, and earn a living with your own hands, just as we told you to do.

verses.kjv: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without, and that ye may have lack of nothing.
verses.ct: That way, your daily life will earn the respect of outsiders, and you won't need to depend on anyone else.

verses.kjv: But I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope.
verses.ct: Now, brothers and sisters, we don't want you to be uninformed about those who have died, so that you won't grieve like people who have no hope.

verses.kjv: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him.
verses.ct: Since we believe that Jesus died and came back to life, we can also be confident that God will bring back with Jesus those who have died believing in him.

verses.kjv: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord, that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep.
verses.ct: We are telling you this based on the Lord's own word: those of us who are still alive when the Lord returns will not go ahead of those who have already died.

verses.kjv: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first:
verses.ct: The Lord himself will come down from heaven with a commanding shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trumpet call of God. Those who died in Christ will rise first.

verses.kjv: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
verses.ct: After that, those of us who are still alive will be caught up together with them in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air. And from that point on, we will be with the Lord forever.

verses.kjv: Wherefore comfort one another with these words.
verses.ct: So encourage one another with these words.
